articles.title: Scan Your Shopping Cart With Yuka and Make Healthier Choices
articles.description: Are there carcinogenic red dyes in your canned soup, or is it just a little too salty? Yuka can tell you, but you may not like what you find.
articles.content:
The Yuka ratings for food come from three weighted considerations:
  • 60% from the Nutri-Score
  • 30% from additives
  • 10% based on whether the product is organic
